summary: A young man spurs romance and helps his friend and himself go through times and struggles of their ordinary life in Denmark.
cast: Jakob Cedergren|Nicolas Bro|Tilly Scott Pedersen|Morten Suurballe|Bodil Jørgensen|Nicolaj Kopernikus|Anders Hove|Kristian Halken|Thomas W. Gabrielsson|Michelle Bjørn-Andersen|Pauli Ryberg|Mikael Bertelsen|Asta Esper Hagen Andersen|Vera Gebuhr|Peder Thomas Pedersen|Angela Bundalovic|Steen Budde-Lund|Michael Rasmussen|Nanna Schaumborg-Muller|Josephine Thorup Arnfred|Francisco Cañizares Quero|Ib Tardini|Simon Bonde|Knut Harvik|Asger Gottlieb|Willy Rye Hansen|Susan Jakobsen|Anne Bærskog Hauger|Marianne Møller|Jørgen Nielsen|Mads-Peter Schmidt|Børge Wulff|Keld Jensen|Rikki Winter|Peter Harton|Morten Fisker|Peter Nørgaard|Rasmus B. Pedersen
title: Voksne mennesker
